calendar.title: Check Instagram Export Email
calendar.details: Check your email for Instagram data export and upload to Unfollow Tracker at safeunfollow.app

1.title: Open Instagram Export Page
1.description: Click the button below to open Meta Accounts Center. Then click "Create export" to begin.
1.alt: Step 1: Open Instagram Export Page and click Create export

2.title: Choose Your Instagram Profile
2.description: Select your Instagram account from the list of connected profiles.

3.title: Select "Export to device"
3.description: Choose to export directly to your device for maximum privacy. Your data stays with you.
3.alt: Step 3: Select Export to device option

4.title: ⚠️ Select Only "Followers and following"
4.description: Click "Customize" → Clear all checkboxes → Check ONLY "Followers and following". This keeps your file small and fast.
4.alt: Step 4: Customize to select only Followers and following

5.title: Set Date Range to "All time"
5.description: Click "Date range" → Select "All time" → Save. This ensures you get your complete follower history.
5.alt: Step 5: Set date range to All time

6.title: ⚠️ Change Format to JSON
6.description: This is critical! Click "Format" → Select "JSON" (not HTML). HTML files will NOT work with our analyzer.

7.title: Review & Start Export
7.description: Verify your settings show: Followers and following, All time, JSON format. Then click "Start export".
7.alt: Step 7: Review settings and start export

8.title: Wait for Email & Download
8.description: Instagram will email you when ready (usually 5-30 minutes). Click the download link in the email to get your ZIP file.
8.alt: Step 8: Wait for email and download ZIP file
